title: Uppu Karuvadu Lyrics Mudhalvan
stanzas: <div>Uppu Karuvadu Lyrics Mudhalvan
Thaen mozhiye..

uppu karuvaadu
oora vachcha soru

uppu karuvaadu
oora vachcha soru
oottivida ne podhum enakku.

muththamittu neththiyila
maarbukku maththiyila
seththuvida thonuthadi enakku.

uppu karuvaadu
oora vachcha soru
oottivida ne podhum enakku.

muththamittu neththiyila
maarbukku maththiyila
seththuvida thonuthadi

oada karai maela
oru oanaa pidippomaa.
kaakkaa kadi kadichi
siru maanga thinbomaa.

kolaakku kolakku kolaakkalaa
kolaa kola kola kolaakalaa
kolaakku kolakku kolaakkalaa
kola kola kola kola kolaakkalaa

kurava meenu
kudhikkura aathukulla
koara pullu mulaikkura
saeththukulla
en kooda sagathi kooththu
aadu thai thai thai.

adi oththa thuni udithi
kulippomaa vetkam
thalli vai vai

lei lei lei lei
lela lei lei lei lei
ponadhu varuvadhum
poi poi poi
irukkira nimizham
mei mei mei

hey vazhai ilaiyila
unna virundhaa
vai vai vai vai

aasaiya paaru
aye aye aye
kadhukul enna
noi noi noi
padhinettu sevai ellaam
sei sei sei sei

kolaakku kolakku kolaakkalaa
kolaa kola kola kolaakalaa
kolaakku kolakku kolaakkalaa
kola kola kola kola kolaakkalaa

uppu karuvaadu
oora vachcha soru
oottivida ne podhum enakku.

muththamittu neththiyila
maarbukku maththiyila
seththuvida thonuthadi enakku.

oh thaen mozhiye
thaen mozhiye
oh lela lei lei lei
thaen mozhiye

kaaththu mattum
nulaiyura kaattukulla
thoonganaa kuruvi koottukulla
orunaalu enna kudiyirukka
vai vai vai vai
ne selai thirudi kondu
ponaalum maanam kaakkum
kai kai.

lai lai lai lai
lai la lai lai lai
aadai enbathu poi poi poi
athu konda porul
mattum mei mei mei
aththanai azhagaiyum
meiyyaa kaiyil vai vai vai vai

nenjukull kaetkudhu
thai thai thai thai
nenachachu muraipadi
sei sei sei
meiyyum meiyyum
kalappathunaan
mei mei mei.

uppu karuvaadu
oora vachcha soru
oottivida venmaa umakku.

muththamittu neththiyila
maarbukku maththiyila
seththuvida thonuthaa umakku.

uppu karuvaadu
oora vachcha soru
oottivida ne podhum enakku.

muththamittu neththiyila

seththuvida thonuthadi ...

seo.title: Uppu Karuvadu Lyrics Mudhalvan
seo.description: Get the complete Uppu Karuvadu Lyrics Mudhalvan from Mudhalvan. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Kavita Krishnamurthy. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Mudhalvan, AR Rahman, Kavita Krishnamurthy, Shankar Mahadevan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
